channel.title: Rhino.NodeInCode on Hugo based API Site
channel.description: Recent content in Rhino.NodeInCode on Hugo based API Site

item.title: NodeInCodeTable
item.description: Namespace: Rhino.NodeInCode Permits rapid access to references to all Grasshopper functions. public class NodeInCodeTable : DynamicObject Constructors NodeInCodeTable(IEnumerableitems) Instantiates the table. Users of RhinoCommon do not typically need to call this constructor. since 6.0 Properties int Count Returns the amount of items in this table. since 6.0 Methods void Add(ComponentFunctionInfo item) Adds, or replaces a new instance of component function information. since 6.0 IEnumerableGetDynamicMemberNames() Returns all additional names in the table.

item.title: ComponentFunctionInfo
item.description: Namespace: Rhino.NodeInCode Defines the base class for a function representing a component. This class is abstract. public class ComponentFunctionInfo Properties Guid ComponentGuid The unique identifier of the Grasshopper component. It is the original developer’s responsibility to ensure that this ID is unique. since 6.0 Delegate Delegate Returns a delegate that can be directly invoked using a list of arguments. This flattens trees. since 6.0 Delegate DelegateNoWarnings Returns a delegate that can be directly invoked using a list of arguments.

item.title: Components
item.description: Namespace: Rhino.NodeInCode Provides access to all Grasshopper runtime components. public class Components Properties static NodeInCodeTable NodeInCodeFunctions Returns a collection with all component functions. since 6.0 Methods static ComponentFunctionInfo FindComponent(string fullName) Finds a component given its full name. since 6.0
